plants.name: Christmas Cactus
plants.description: Colorful blooms around the winter holidays. Prefers bright, indirect light. Water when top of soil feels dry.

plants.name: Monstera
plants.description: Also called the Swiss Cheese Plant. Prefers medium to bright, indirect light. Allow soil to completely dry between waterings. Prefers humidity.

plants.name: Peace Lily
plants.description: Prominent, white blooms are called spathes. Prefers bright, indirect light. Keep soil consistently moist but not soggy. Prefers humidity.

plants.name: Pothos
plants.description: Also called Devil's Ivy. Prefers bright, indirect light but can tolerate lower light conditions. Water shallowly when soil feels dry.

plants.name: Snake Plant
plants.description: A popular, low-maintenance houseplant. Prefers medium, indirect light. Water lightly and infrequently.

plants.name: Spider Plant
plants.description: Easy to propagate spider babies and give as a gift! Prefers bright, indirect light. Allow soil to dry between waterings. Prefers humidity.
